# HPKE.KDF.HKDF_SHA512

**Case**

An HMAC-based key derivation function that uses SHA-2 hashing with a 512-bit digest.

## Declaration

```swift
case HKDF_SHA512
```
title: HPKE.KDF.HKDF_SHA512
